SELECT A.CUSTCODE AS EMP_CODE, A.CUSTCODE AS COPY_CODE, A.CUSTNAME AS EMP_NAME, C.PWD, substr(xmlagg(xmlelement(a,',' || b.role_no)).extract('//text()'), 2) ROLE_NO FROM ORAGMP.CMCUSTM A, SALE_ON.PF_USERROLE_DEV B, ORAGMP.ELECTRONICSIGN C WHERE A.CUSTCODE = B.EMP_CODE(+) AND A.CUSTCODE = C.EMPCODE(+) AND CUSTCODE LIKE '11%' AND A.SAGODIV = #{useYn} -- '2' 거래 중지가 아닌것 AND A.CUSTCODE || A.CUSTNAME LIKE '%' ||{#searchText}|| '%' GROUP BY A.CUSTCODE, A.CUSTNAME, C.PWD
ORDER BY ${sidx} ${sord}

MERGE INTO ORAGMP.CMCUSTM USING DUAL ON ( CUSTCODE = in_custid ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CUSTNAME = in_custnm WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (CUSTCODE, CUSTNAME, SAGODIV) VALUES ( in_custid, in_custnm, in_yn )
MERGE INTO ORAGMP.ELECTRONICSIGN USING DUAL ON ( EMPCODE = in_custid ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET PWD = in_pwd WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (EMPCODE, PWD) VALUES ( in_custid, in_pwd )
